message: Starting backward compatibility analysis - searching for all create_real_task() usage patterns
Analyzing registry schema for breaking changes - checking if new fields affect existing code
Designing backward-compatible strategy for parameter additions - analyzing edge cases and migration path
Documenting edge cases and potential breaking scenarios - analyzing return value changes and global registry impacts

Backward compatibility analysis complete. ZERO breaking changes confirmed. All 24 call sites work unchanged. Registry uses safe .get() pattern. Comprehensive test plan created. Edge cases documented. Migration path defined.
